lead_paragraph: Sri Lankan pace bowler Nuwan Kulasekara quit test cricket on Wednesday in order to focus his attention on the sport's shorter formats, in which he is considered a greater threat with the ball.

headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka's Kulasekara Quits Tests to Focus on ODIs, T20s
headline.main: Sri Lanka's Kulasekara Quits Tests to Focus on ODIs, T20s

snippet: Sri Lankan pace bowler Nuwan Kulasekara quit test cricket on Wednesday in order to focus his attention on the sport's shorter formats, in which he is considered a greater threat with the ball....
